job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and enhancing user-facing applications powered by LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: These are core software development activities, including maintenance and updates based on user feedback.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the development of a specific user-facing application/assistant.
Refers to the use and potential adaptation of Large Language Models, a core aspect of generative modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: Involves evaluating and integrating advanced AI technologies, implying hands-on work with models.
This refers to the software engineering aspect of incorporating AI models into existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how to apply technologies to improve business processes and user workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures
job_tasks.justification: This points to the software development lifecycle of improving and integrating AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: This involves ensuring the operational stability and user satisfaction of deployed AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly states the business objective and impact of the role's activities.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures
ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues
significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes creating and improving applications using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art generative AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision, and building systems like customer support assistants. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer.
